mapper.insert: insert into review (id, res_code, content, rate) values(#{id}, #{res_code}, #{content}, #{rate})
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, rate=#{rate}, review_date=now() where review_no=#{review_no} and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_no=#{review_no} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select review_no, m_name, r.id, r.res_code, content, review_date, rate from review r inner join member m on r.id=m.id where r.res_code=#{res_code}
select ifnull(avg(rate),0) from review where res_code=#{res_code}
